Package de.awi.floenavigation.sample_measurement

SampleMeasurementActivity is called from the MainActivity when the grid initial setup is completed and the device list has been imported from the server during synchronization.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SampleMeasurementActivity
    SampleMeasurementActivity can be used to take sample or measurement on the sea ice.

Package de.awi.floenavigation.sample_measurement Description

SampleMeasurementActivity is called from the MainActivity when the grid initial setup is completed and the device list has been imported from the server during synchronization.

This activity provides the user of the app to take samples or measurements on the sea ice floe. Depending on the use case, the user can select between sample and measurement using a drop down list. An advanced search for selection of devices based on initial 2 characters has been implemented using AutoCompleteTextView. When the device has been selected, all other information such as SampleMeasurementActivity.deviceFullNameIndex, SampleMeasurementActivity.deviceIDIndex will be automatically populated on the views. If the gps location is available, the user can press the confirm button to store the sample in the internal database table. The user can also view all the samples currently stored in the database by pressing view samples, the user will be presented with a list of samples with information such as sample name, comment, x and y position on the grid ListViewActivity.

See Also:
SyncActivity, SampleMeasurement
